answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I have found a number of places that have taken on water main lining projects. You may want to contact them directly for more specific information.
City of East Providence, RI:
http://www.eastprovidenceri.net/content/666/738/746/782/826/2708.aspx
City of Denver, CO:
http://www.denverwater.org/ConstructionProjects/Re-liningPipes/
City of Minneapolis, MN:
http://www.ci.minneapolis.mn.us/cip/water-clean-line/
I have also included sample contract bidding information from the City of Keene, NH:
http://www.ci.keene.nh.us/departments/finance/purchasing/01-11-08-2011-water-main-lining-project-baker-street
The City of Coon Rapids, MN also approved a water main lining project. The article below includes their price quotes.
http://abcnewspapers.com/2011/05/14/watermain-lining-contract-approved/
I also found a report done by the EPA about the Cost of Water Supply Distribution System Rehabilitation. It has a lot of good information about the varied methods of lining but the cost estimates may be outdated.
http://www.epa.gov/nrmrl/pubs/600ja02406/600ja02406.pdf
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
